text: @JaniceDean @usatodayopinion @NYGovCuomo Gov. Cuomo continues to speak about the good job NY did during the coronavirus. He refuses to accept blame for the pain, suffering, & death he caused. I'm so sorry about the preventable deaths of your loved ones.Thank you for correcting Cuomo's false story & continue doing so.
